title: How Science is Nested in Religion
description:
The flat quantifiable world described by the scientific method is necessarily contained in the ontological hierarchy described by religion.

patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/PageauCarvings

For more on ancient cosmology, please read my article "Where is Heaven?":  https://www.orthodoxartsjournal.org/where-is-heaven/
